akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 104–333, div. I, title VIII, § 814(d)(1)(D), Nov. 12, 1996, 110 Stat. 4196

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 284f. Repealed. Pub. L. 104–333, div. I, title VIII, § 814(d)(1)(D), Nov. 12, 1996, 110 Stat. 4196
Section, Pub. L. 89–671, § 7, as added Pub. L. 97–310, Oct. 14, 1982, 96 Stat. 1457, related to reports to congressional committees respecting reconstruction of Center.
